1168810.name: NASCAR Heat 4 - October Paid Pack
1168810.description:
Buy the NASCAR Heat 4 October DLC content and get 35+ new paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, 10 new paint schemes from the NASCAR Xfinity Series, 10 new paint schemes from the Gander Outdoors Truck Series, and 3 new Challenges! Paint schemes to include many of your favorite Darlington Throwbacks, including:

MENCS:
Denny Hamlin, FedEx Racing Throwback
Brad Keselowski, Rusty Wallace Throwback
Austin Dillon, American Ethanol Throwback
Martin Truex Jr., Bass Pro Shops Throwback

NXS:
Michael Annett, Baby Ruth Throwback
Justin Haley, Raybestos Throwback
1168810.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
